custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is in the ballpark guide page for a team
and ad ops configures an ad for a specific team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then an Ad Banner will be seen at the bottom of that team's Ballpark guide page and the event details page
but will not be visible in other team's summary or event details page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is in the ballpark guide page
and an ad has been configured for the team 
and the ad appears at the bottom of the page
and ad ops removes the ad
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will no longer be able to see the ad at the bottom of the page(ballpark guide page and event details page)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an ad ops has enabled a global ad
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the ad will appear on both the ballpark guide page and event details page of every team unless a team has a team specific ad enabled for it
